Sharp Disposal, which is a program of the Diabetes Foundation of Rhode Island. They provide sharps containers to the public. Participants can deposit their full sharps container in the collection receptacle and then pick up their next free container. Please call the Diabetes Foundation for more information and additional drop-off locations.
